title.rendered: Amazing betting affiliate 1xBet platform for everybody

content.rendered:
1xBet is an online betting platform on which a lot of people spend their free time. It gives not only an opportunity to watch favorite events in the field of sports but also to make a profit out of it. The bookmaker offers an extensive range of sports disciplines to make bets on as well as various games which the users can play conveniently online without walking from home. People should simply create an account on the website using their computer, mobile phone or tablet and then use all the services offered there. There is also an amazing betting affiliate 1xBet platform available for everybody. 

1xBet Partners is an official affiliate program that is responsible for promoting the platform. It was established in 2011 and is accessible from many countries around the world as well as in various languages. The program allows them to make a profit from advertising the platform and its services. So, an affiliate should tell people about the 1xBet through diverse channels and social platforms so as to encourage them to become users of the bookmaker’s webpage. The amount of money he earns depends on how active the new players are on the website. 

Details about 1xBet Partners

If a person is willing to become a part of the program, he should fill up a form on the website with personal information. Then the application will be checked and approved by specialists. It usually takes one or two days to perform that procedure. After the registration is completed, an affiliate gets access to his personal account, where there are special materials such as banners, images and videos which will be helpful in the marketing campaign. Moreover, they will already contain the personal ID of an affiliate so that all the players attracted to the website by him could be identified. 

When it comes to payment on betting affiliate 1xBet amazing platform, here are the important details regarding that point:

  • 1xBet uses such a payment model which is called the Revenue Share. It means that each partner gets money according to the activity of the users he has brought to the platform, mainly their deposits and winnings. 
  • The commission starts from 15% and may be increased in accordance with the activity of an affiliate as he earns money on the basis of activity of his brought players, their deposits and winnings.
  • The payouts are performed every week on Tuesday. 
  • The minimum sum of money which can be withdrawn is $30. 

1xBet enjoys popularity not only among the players but also affiliates who have a chance to make a profit through advertising a bookmaker thanks to a special affiliate program.
